name: Emoji Reaction Rating
author: Dynathemes

sections.description:
This is a very captivating and effective plugin that can be used in your WordPress blog.
The purpose of this plugin is to make it easy for your readers to rate your content on a
personal level which in turn, help writers understand the behavior of the reader towards
each article.

The plugin features a 5-point scale ranging from the lowest (1.0 – ‘Pff’) to the highest
(5.0 – ‘Wow!’) which has emojis reaction with each rating panel where the expressions
range from angry react (Pff) to an appreciative one. This is great as it becomes more
comprehendible for the writers to evaluate their own skills as well as intuitively judge
their content and perhaps, improve them.

Further, in the context of Google 5-star rating SERPs markup, when users rate your
blog post, Google will show star rating on the search result page. This makes it very
hard for people to resist reading your posts as there are star ratings with it.
Last but not least, you can edit/remove/add everything you see in the plugin.

For example: you can upload your own emojis and rating text to convince the reader to
rate the article.

Click here for Demo.
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin
  2. Activate the plugin
  3. Go to Settings -> Emoji Reaction Rating Settings
  4. Select post Types and your desired icons and titles and Save it.
  5. You can now see Emoji Reaction Rating section on selected post type’s single post page.

short_description: A useful plugin to create Emoji based Reaction Ratings for post types by DynaThemes.com
